name: VAR
description: Declares a named variable to store the result of an expression.

name: RETURN
description: Output the result of a variable block.

name: EVALUATE
description: Executes a DAX query and returns a table.

name: DEFINE
description: Introduces a query definition block for local measures, columns, or tables.

name: MEASURE
description: Defines a measure within a query scope (used inside DEFINE).

name: COLUMN
description: Defines a calculated column within a query scope (used inside DEFINE).

name: TABLE
description: Defines a calculated table within a query scope (used inside DEFINE).

name: ORDER BY
description: Sorts the result of an EVALUATE statement or Window function.

name: START AT
description: Specifies the starting values for an ORDER BY clause in a query.

name: PARTITION BY
description: Divides the table into partitions for window functions.

name: MATCHBY
description: Defines the columns used to match data in window functions.

name: ASC
description: Sorts the column in ascending order.

name: DESC
description: Sorts the column in descending order.

name: IN
description: Logical operator to check if a value exists in a list or column.

name: STRING
description: Data type definition for DATATABLE.

name: INTEGER
description: Data type definition for DATATABLE.

name: DOUBLE
description: Data type definition for DATATABLE.

name: DATETIME
description: Data type definition for DATATABLE.

name: CURRENCY
description: Data type definition for DATATABLE.

name: BOOLEAN
description: Data type definition for DATATABLE.
